title: 8bitdo Controller Buying Guide: Ultimate Bluetooth vs. Ultimate 2.4 vs. Pro 2
description:
Buy one on Amazon: https://lon.tv/wckei and find other 8bitdo controller colors from Aknes: https://amzn.to/3MtlPpY (compensated affiliate links) - 8bitdo's more premium controllers are pretty great but a few of them can be a little confusing when it comes to the feature set. In this video we'll compare the Ultimate Bluetooth & 2.4ghz models along with the Pro 2 and the SN30 pro. See more 8bit do: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIt2qhI5w4F0TJj9zOkXKABa and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
01:12 - Ultimate Bluetooth vs. Ultimate 2.4 ghz
04:02 - Ultimate Dock, Power, Connectivity
06:46 - D-Pads
07:22 - Pro 2 Controller
08:51 - Triggers
09:01 - SN30 Pro
09:57 - 8bitdo Ultimate Software: Mapping, etc
12:59 - Conclusion
